created_by: Florian Roth (rule), Lee Holmes (idea), Harish Segar (improvements)
name: PowerShell Downgrade Attack
description: Detects PowerShell downgrade attack by comparing the host versions with the actually used engine version 2.0
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EngineVersion:2.* AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.HostVersion:2.*)))`
